item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:

3. An indie studio created a game based on Stanislaw Lem's novel (20 points | 8 comments)

29. Debian's "secret" sauce (116 points | 20 comments)
30. Using reinforcement learning and $4.80 of GPU time to find the best HN post (146 points | 68 comments)
